post.description: Creates a new Contributor given a name.

get.description: List all contributors - returns a ContributorListResponse containing the Contributors.

delete.description: Delete a Contributor by providing a valid integer id.

get.summary: Get a Contributor by integer ID.
get.description: Takes a positive integer ID and returns a matching Contributor record.

put.description:
Update an existing Contributor by providing a fully defined replacement set of values.
See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60761955/rest-update-best-practice-put-collection-id-without-id-in-body-vs-put-collecti

ErrorResponse.description: the dto used to send an error response to the client

statusCode.description: the http status code sent to the client. default is 400.

message.description: the message for the error response

errors.description: the collection of errors for the current context

JWTBearerAuth.description: Enter a JWT token to authorize the requests...
